==== capturedShorthandPropertyAssignmentNoCheck.ts (0 errors) ====
    const fns = [];
    for (const value of [1, 2, 3]) {
        fns.push(() => ({ value }));
    }
    const result = fns.map(fn => fn());
    console.log(result)
